directions.content: Click the correct answer for each question. Click Submit to check your answers.

question.content: The police are still investigating the situation. Which sentence has the same meaning?

option.content: The police are still destroying the situation.
The police are no longer looking at the situation.
The police are still studying the situation.

question.content: It can be difficult to maintain your weight while on vacation. Which sentence has the same meaning?

option.content: It can be difficult to keep the same weight while on vacation.
It can be difficult to lose weight while on vacation.
It can be difficult to gain weight while on vacation.

question.content: Susan sent her friend an e-mail, but she didn't get a response. What probably happened?

option.content: her friend sent an e-mail back

question.content: What becomes difficult to do when the sun shines brightly?
Nobody understood the hiker's disappearance on the mountain. What happened to the hiker?

option.content: He was afraid to go up the mountain.
He took a long time to go up the mountain.
